description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans diverse topics like decentralization, digital landscapes, and regenerative design. yeehaa's blog posts and curated courses reflect his interdisciplinary approach, exploring concepts from ecosystem architecture to waste in economy and culture. He advocates for embracing complexity, innovation, and collaboration in addressing global challenges.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to transform education and foster inclusive digital ecosystems. His work explores decentralization, regenerative design, and innovative approaches to global challenges.
